Your goal is to successfully build and run the workspace as a local development environment.

## Quick start
Refer to [README.md](../../README.md) for detailed setup instructions including prerequisites and getting started steps.
Use the npm scripts defined in [package.json](../../package.json) for common development tasks (start, build, test, lint, etc.).

## Checklist
- [ ] Required dependencies from package.json installed
- [ ] Lint, build, and test tasks run successfully
- [ ] Dev server running and reachable
- [ ] Short, engaging welcome tour verified in-app (menus/routes/guards behaving as expected)

#Output
Provide a summary of the setup process including any issues encountered and how they were resolved.
provide how to run the development environment once setup is complete.
